Description:
Model
Brand: ORICO
Series: ORICO PVU3-7U
Model: ORICO PVU3-7U


Details
Type: Mini PCI Express to USB Card
External USB Ports: 7x USB Ports
Standard: USB 3.0 5Gbps
Data Transfer Rate: Up to 5.0 Gbps
Operating Systems Supported: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 / Vista / XP
Compatibility: Compatible with Windows 10 / 8 / 7 / Vista / XP


Features
Features: 7-port USB expansion
PVU3-7U is equipped with 7 USB3.0 ports, which can expand multiple devices and sync quickly, improving efficiency, saving much time.

USB3.0 5Gbps
USB3.0 transfers data up to 5Gbps, 10 times faster than USB2.0, also backwards compatible with USB2.0 / 1.1.

High-performance controller
Built-in high-performance controller supports SuperSpeed USB3.0 transmission, makes stable operation and excellent performance.

Easy to use
Expand 7 USB3.0 ports through PCI-E slot, hot-swapping supported, plug and play, convenient and fast.

High quality
All solid state capacitor and precise PCBA bring you amazing user experience.

Widely compatible
Make the motherboard without USB3.0 port upgrade to the motherboard with USB3.0 port; compatible with Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 and Linux.

Easy installation
Chassis power supply; easy to install with mounting screws and driver CD.


Dimensions & Weight
Dimensions: 121 x 83 x 20mm


Packaging
Package Contents: 1 x ORICO PVU3-7U Booster USB3.0 Host Card 
1 x 4 PIN to 15 PIN SATA Power Connector 
1 x User's Manual 1x Warranty Card
Label: PCIe Card Orico 7xUSB 3.0
